Subject: ERR_connection_closed error while accessing websites
Description: Hello Support Team, A few users have reported ERR_connection_closed error while accessing websites for different websites. The issue disappears when the agent is reloaded. NOTE: I created a separate ticket from 00415365, because in that case the error in the browser was err_timed_out, and also the error messages in the eppsplit.log file was not the same. Attaching the logs.
What_We_Know__c: EPP is causing this error: "ERR_connection_closed error" while accessing websites
Next_Steps__c: A test build was provided to the customer and I'm waiting for the confirmation if the issue is addressed.
